title.native: 彼女が公爵邸に行った理由
title.romaji: Kanojo ga Koushaku-tei ni Itta Riyuu
title.english: Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke’s Mansion

description:
Living inside a fairy tale may sound like a dream, but for this heroine, it’s more of a nightmare. After her mysterious death, Rinko is reborn as Raeliana—a loved and wealthy character in a novel. But she knows the ending: her murder at the hands of her fiancé. So, she hatches a plan to stay alive, one that involves a devilish duke and a phony engagement. Can she rewrite her story?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: พระเอกของฉันเป็นท่านดยุค
Como Raeliana Foi Parar na Mansão do Duque
Comment Raeliana a survécu au manoir Wynknight
The Reason Why Raeliana Ended up at the Duke's Mansion
Raeliana: Warum sie die Verlobte des Dukes wurde

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Body Swapping
tags.description: Centers around individuals swapping bodies with one another.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Fake Relationship
tags.description: When two characters enter a fake relationship that mutually benefits one or both involved.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

node.description: Keiji Inai is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with the music production company IMAGINE.

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MindaRynOfficial) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mindaryn_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/mindaryn_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/MindaRyn/)

A Thai YouTuber known for singing anisong covers. She has gone on to perform the theme songs to several anime series.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/erickbglx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/erickbglx/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/ErickDublou)

Erick Bougleux is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.

[Website](https://www.danidchambers.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SkiniMini07) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/danidchambers/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/DaniChambersVA/)

An American actress and voice actress who currently resides in Dallas, Texas.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/caitlinsvoice) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/caitlinsvoice/) | [Myspace](https://myspace.com/caitlintiffany) | [Blog](https://kiristokyoto.livejournal.com/)

An American voice actor, voice director, and script writer for Funimation, New Generation Pictures, and Bang Zoom! Entertainment. She's been working in the anime industry since 2004. She grew up in the San Diego area, California, and has been married to Tony Patterson since 2009. Outside of voice acting, Caitlin has worked as an ESL teacher in Spain.
